p.text: Lines - all the data recorded in the table. The string specified in this form: "Line1" | "Line1", "Line2" | "Line2". Lines are separated by commas (","). Thus first row of data tables in this record - "Line1" | "Line1" , the second line - "Line2" | "Line2" . Cells inside a string delimited ("|"). Ie Line "Line1" | "Line1" consists of two cells, each of which is recorded Line1 .

remarks.text: quotes in writing: "Line1" | "Line1", "Line2" | "Line2" - required. If you want to change the columns in the process of your program, then such action should look something like this: Window1.Tablitsa1.Stroki = "" "Line1" "|" "Line1", "" Line2 "" | "" Line2 "" " Since two double quotes ( "") within the text is converted to a double ( ") and the output get exactly:" Line1 "|" Line1 "," Line2 "|" Line2 "
